scripts.install: npm install && chmod +x firebaseAdminCLI.sh && chmod +x createSymlink.sh && ./createSymlink.sh && echo "firebaseAdminCLI was installed succesfully." && echo "Call firebaseAdmin to start the CLI" && echo "Make sure to create a firebaseCredential.json file with you private service key, on the firebaseAdminCLI folder" && exit 1
